name: Titanic: The Adventure Begins...
overview: April 14th 1912. On her maiden voyage, in mid Atlantic, the Titanic struck and iceberg. She sank within three hours taking with her a vast fortune in GOLD. Your mission is to find the Titanic and recover the lost gold. BUT FIRST: you have to raise sufficient finance for the expedition. AND THEN: you need to buy supplies and expert help: a shopping list is provided. Some tings are essential and others may not be so spend wisely. Now, Captain, you are ready to set sail in search of the titanic, find it on one of the three decks it could have ended up on, in over 460 possible locations, your air supply is limited and there may be other, unexpected dangers.
